website_summaries.verdict: The Logitech G Pro X wired gaming headset combines a sturdy, comfortable design with a USB sound card loaded with customizable headphone and microphone settings.
pros: Excellent mic with Blue Microphones software adjustments
Strong audio performance with crisp highs
cons: No phone controls on either cable

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality for that price
customer_reviews.text: I have tried so many different headset and I have always found them good but not perfect till I bought this. The sound is amazing and you can play with the Equalizer to do what you want. The Logitech software is really a must here as you can download profile to match game that you play. I used to struggle to hear steps in COD Warfare/Warzone. Not anymore ! This is a game changer. The blue voice feature is also great and again with the Logitech software, you an play and make your voice differnt. perfect for Streamer or video content creator
customer_reviews.author: Samikaz

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this headset yet.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this headset yet there is a common issue revolving around the mic and its a shame I had the same issue. The issue seems to be around software being faulty or its compatibility with certain windows updates which makes the mic not produce sound even though the device is connected and everything is working.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan clarke

customer_reviews.title: I found the g430 to be far superior
customer_reviews.text: So they are built great. They look great, they fit a bit tight on temples so can become uncomfortable. I downloaded the drivers and software, and they sounded dookie. It sounds like you are in a cave, the surround sound really isnt surround at all. Footsteps behind you sound as if they are beside you, the rear surround sound is shocking. Maybe its the g pro suit software, but in my humble opinion, i sent for a return and went back to using my logitech g430's instead. At least with those i can hear a fly fart across the map in the future. I am really disappointed with this headset.
customer_reviews.author: simon

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: Left ear gone deaf after only 2 months of owning. Very annoying. The sound quality was great when it worked, and the microphone was crystal clear.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Owen

customer_reviews.title: Happy chap.
customer_reviews.text: -Post fault, see edit below- Really good headphones, but the left ear is fading for some reason and I'm unable to return them which is great. Can't get a replacement even though i clearly hear more out of the right ear than i do the left ear... ridiculous. That's why this is a 1 star review, why would the return window close on the same day i bought it. Edit - I got my return, thank you Amazon for the amazing customer service. This headset works just as it should now, which is amazing. The surround is fantastic and the audio quality is even better than the last pair. You guys did good.
customer_reviews.author: Bronstantine

customer_reviews.title: Great headset let down by a mic which is impossible to configure
customer_reviews.text: Excellent design and build quality, and a great sound quality. However this product is completely let down by the fact that the microphone just doesn't work, and certainly doesn't plug and play. It won't work on its own or with the gHub software downloaded. I put two working days into trying to fix the problem, rolling back drivers etc. but no luck at all. I just can't invest any more time into this. I can tell from many similar online comments that this is a widely recognised product defect, and I await the next generation of this otherwise excellent headset, but for now I am returning it for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Swampo1958

customer_reviews.title: You have to set them up
customer_reviews.text: fresh out the box they sound like doo doo but if you download presets and use voicemeeter to add a little more volume and bass on them they are excellent for music (without surround enabled) and movies (with surround enabled) as for gaming you can get really nice sounds from it with surround on The microphone on the other hand picks up eeeeeeverytthiing if you have a mechanical keyboard you WILL be that guy that has the loud clicky board in voice chat even picks up your mouse clicks the bluevoice software sounds like dump over discord apparently really boxy sounding but great if your not using the bluevoice maybe something to do with the processing
customer_reviews.author: S.Durrant

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones but only with 1 problem
customer_reviews.text: Coming from a pair of Cloud 2s I've had for 4 years, I was immediately comfortable with these as they are very similar. The microphone functionality is the best I've seen on a headset and the software in G Hub lets you customise anything you want Only issue I had which stops me from giving a 5* review is that the sound seems quiet even when at 100% maxed out volume. Some other friends with this headset did not feel the same way and said they use theirs at around 70% volume and it's loud enough but from others I've heard the same issue as mine so not too sure
customer_reviews.author: Shaz

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound & Microphone Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of gaming headsets such as Sennheiser's game series and the Hyperx revolver/cloud series and I can safely say this headset has the best microphone I've used, with blue voice-activated via the USB dongle it sounds so much better than without it, as well as that the sound quality is great for listening to music or whilst gaming, but seriously if you're after a decent sounding headset with a very good microphone you can't go wrong with this. I only wish you could push the microphone out the way instead of it always being in front of you.
customer_reviews.author: Dart4

customer_reviews.title: BUY THISSS ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is amazing also with the mic quality. Comes with USB dongles and detachable mic. Really sturdy headset and fits my head so well even though my head shape is long. Unlucky genetics i guess. Also i have really big and thick hair and even after wearing it for 5 hours at a time it caused me no pain and fits my ears so nicely. 0 noise bleed, sound quality is amazing especially for gaming. Surround sound is also great, so use the logitech software even though its plug and play which is also a W. best headset i ever bought, to be honest. Also great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Rami

customer_reviews.title: Best value high end headset
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as solely headphones to replace my 4 year old Turtle Beaches. I use a desk mic so the Blue Vo!ce microphone does not get any use. The initial setup took me about 2 hours of installing, reinstalling and restarting my PC. This is the only reason why this is four stars. The custom equaliser in the G Hub has very good sound reproduction, the different sound profiles for each game are very useful. The community share feature is great for downloading and sharing your own settings. Great headset, very comfortable with tonnes of padding, 7.1 surround sound for gaming which is the best surround sound i have used on any pair of headphones before. Would highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this headset. The packaging, construction, and everything about it is high-quality. The included cables for various devices is a nice touch and provides a complete package for use with phones, laptop, PC, etc. Noise cancelling isn't a feature, but they do a good job of keeping out background noise. I can wear these for a few hours with no discomfort. Definitely prefer them to a Hyper X Cloud headset I had previously.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: perfect for Content Creators!
customer_reviews.text: What can i say? except for this is the best headset i have ever brought, When i came to creating content for different projects i always found problems in the audio but when it came to these, all my problems went a way. So simple to use and if you have a noisy enviroment you can change the mic settings to block it all out! 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Nathan G

customer_reviews.title: Good for gaming
customer_reviews.text: Great headset im loving it. It has really good fit and comes with 2 sets of cushions one leather and one velour plush. Prefer the velour since it sits nice and comfortable. Sound quality is crisp and the blue mic is really good. The g lab software compliments it well with adjustable profiles available made from other users. However the price is a little steep. Grab this on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Mahtab

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this at all. After having it 2 weeks, the sound would not come through. It was registered on my pc, however the only way to get sound through was to uninstall the G Hub app. However when turning my pc on again the next day, the only way to get to work was to install it. This repeated for several days. I tried contacting support on the phone to be in a queue for an hour. I decided to email them, 18 days ago now, and to this day, no reply. Therefore it has been returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Marriott

customer_reviews.title: Blown away by this headset, amazing microphone!
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best headset I have ever owned. My friends were blown away with how nice my microphone is! The app you use has great settings to adjust and its really comfortable over long periods of gaming. I'm so pleased with this headset! And as always it's sturdy and of good build quality!
customer_reviews.author: TheHonestBloke

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 5 Star if it wasn't for the super tight fit. After 1-2 Hours they really hurt my head from the pressure very unfortunate as the sound quality from the speakers and mic was amazing for the money!! Ended up actually returning as on Day 2 the right cup seemed to dim on sound if slight pressure was applied or even slightly turning my head. I am going to assume I was unlucky and received a dud pair. Would I recommend? MASSIVE YES - IF you have a pin head.... you will be satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months the left ear stopped working completely
customer_reviews.text: At first, I was delighted with the Logitech Pro Headset. I was extremely careful with the headset even though it appears a sturdy build quality. Yesterday I noticed the left ear was malfunctioning while I was playing Warzone on the PS4. Then all of a sudden it completely stopped working. I downloaded G HUB to see if it was a setting I could tweak back to default settings but nothing. Terrible build quality for the price. I would avoid at all costs unless there is some warranty that can fix mine bearing in mind the price I paid for the best quality headset I could afford.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Headset, but there are a few hurdles to start with.
customer_reviews.text: The headset is great and has very good sound quality but when I first got the headset and pluged it in there were a few issues with the mic not working. A google search shows that these issues can be due to several issues but there are lots of very easy fixes to get them to work. Mine was literally to plug the headset in, in the correct order. They are very trivial but when you get the headset to work it has very good sound quality and the mic is also very good from what my friends have told me.
customer_reviews.author: a mum

customer_reviews.title: 7.1 function is non existence
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are made of great quality but 7.1 is the worst I've ever listened to. You cannot make out a difference of where the footsteps are coming from. The mic sounds great but its 50 per cent low from all other standard mics. It will be getting returned tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: DANNY

customer_reviews.title: Close and clear audio with the best microphone on the market
customer_reviews.text: The headsets overall combined quality is above par and beats many headphones in a higher price range. I own a pair of wireless hyper x and a pair of hyper x cloud 2, the main difference is the sound it depend on what you prefer. The G PRO X sounds close and defined where as the hyper x cloud 2 sound wider and clear. I would like to exaggerate how good the microphone is on this headset. I believe logitech next release will fully incorporate the blue microphone without any software but with that being said if you turn off the software they still sound fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Kerr

customer_reviews.title: Great but broke
customer_reviews.text: So the logitech g pro x is a great headset and i would probably reccomend for anyone looking for good value, but there are always things to worry about and i will list them below Pros - great sound quality - very comfortable - very premium - good value Cons - the mics softwware doesnt seem to work very well, the mic overall was average at best - The big one: they broke after less than 7 months, t he left ear cup does not work In a nutshell i am sure theses headphones are great for most people but still quite unreliable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite headset
customer_reviews.text: Just a really good headset, may be a tad on the expensive side. But with a clean aesthetic , super comfy and no silly and obsolete features this headset has quickly become my favorite. The build quality is very good and much better than that of any razer headset and an improvement upon the Logitech g600 series
customer_reviews.author: sam

customer_reviews.title: Producer here - I'm happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent, Microphone quality could still be improved a little, headset comfort is second to none. very impressed with these phones, i usually stick with my Bayer DT 770s but now have a headset with attached Mic that i can use for work calls.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: brilliant headset
customer_reviews.text: Great headset , games like PUBG the directional sound is amazing, got good base to them , sound can be turned up very loud &super comfy to wear not the comfiest but once you adjust it and wear it for a few days you don't notice its on
customer_reviews.author: cal oconnor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality, mic needs to be pushed in hard!!
customer_reviews.text: The overall quality on this headset is amazing, and the sound is even better! The only issue I had with it was the the mic wasn’t getting any input. It turns out you have to push it really hard until you hear two clicks rather than just one as it will register the mic but have zero input if you only get one click. The software you can download is really good as well and there are lots of modifications you can do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good headset at decent price
customer_reviews.text: This would be a 5 star device if ot was both wireless and wired so I can take them on my commute journey every thay to use it with my phone which does not have a 3.5mm jack port.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Canta

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing headset but the one thing that lets it down is the software and logitechs terrible non-existent customer service but if you are not going to use their persets then you are golden with this headset
customer_reviews.author: Dirishfella

customer_reviews.title: Check amount before ordering, and don’t count on quality.
customer_reviews.text: After ordering two sets by mistake, and returning one set, the microphone on the other set didn’t work, so that one was returned too.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. A. Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Used this mainly for conference calls via MS Teams - really thought they would be great but they began developing a crackling noise during the calls that was unbearable - I thought it was maybe the other people's lines that were bad, but I then tried my son's HyperX gaming headset and it worked perfectly - so definitely a Logitech issue. Very sad I have to return these as they look good and were comfortable - but of no use to me with the crackling issue.
customer_reviews.author: A business User

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for headphones
customer_reviews.text: These headphones died on one side after nearly 3 weeks of occasionally use. Good sound quality and feel premium but clearly that is not true due too how long they lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Not wireless! 😡
customer_reviews.text: I brought this thinking it was wireless it was not. ☹️I was sure it had mentioned it was wireless when I brought it.
customer_reviews.author: Pirateblackheart

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gaming Headset
customer_reviews.text: What a great product. Well worth the money. Eveyone says i sound like radio presenter. No in-game noise coming through the mic. A must buy for gamers!!!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, the sound quality is great, the noise reduction from the ear pieces is not bad. Voice clarity is great. I find them extremely comfortable. I would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headset, honestly I don't know if this is just because I've upgraded from a 7.99 car boot sale mic to this. Such an increase in quality obviously, I can hear footsteps behind me and all around and the mic is just absolutely fantastic so much customisation especially with the blue sound
customer_reviews.author: Jude Crutchley

customer_reviews.title: microphone is good, however
customer_reviews.text: The headset i found to be very uncomfy and tight on the head even though it is a light headset. iam having other issues with the head band digging into the top of my head. the sound quality is OKAY nothing amazing.
customer_reviews.author: jamason

customer_reviews.title: Good Headset but mic broke just after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I was enjoying the headset a lot, sound quality was great and the mic quality was perfect with the blue voice but after a few weeks the mic just broke out of nowhere (it may have broke from using it on my ps4 but I'm not sure and it wouldn't make much sense that it would break from being plugged into my ps4) great headset, would recommend... but maybe just stick to using it on a pc
customer_reviews.author: CriticalCrit

customer_reviews.title: Great present
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my partners birthday- he plays a lot of PC games such as dota and elder scrolls but also uses for work and watching films. He says they're brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: Great headset, microphone quality lives up to the hype. I've used logitech headsets for years and my G933's have worked perfectly for 2 years. Hoping these will last as long. Only issue is the headset being wired, definitely takes some time to adjust!
customer_reviews.author: Pip1337

customer_reviews.title: Microphone not working.
customer_reviews.text: Good build quality and amazing sound. But that's about it. After trying for half a day to make the microphone work I gave up and asked for a refund. I recommend try to avoid this headset and look for something else. Too much hassle for the money you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Paul-Christian Marian

customer_reviews.title: The quality control is garbage
customer_reviews.text: Good gaming headset however the right earpiece stopped working after 1 month which is honestly ridiculous on my first headset, I ordered a second one and 6 months later it did the same thing, STAY AWAY.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and sound great
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant headset. Only thing that lets them down is no functionality to adjust voice volumes to game volume
customer_reviews.author: Corey Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Customizability
customer_reviews.text: Customizability of settings can be overwhelming. Can't tell how the headphones are supposed to sound, yet I feel like after some time with playing around with the EQ it sounds better for my needs. Mic quality is way better than my old Razer Kraken 7.1's, yet when it comes to the sound the Gaming X pros are clearer than the krakens yet more shallow it seems like, especially when the 7.1 setting is turned off in the software.
customer_reviews.author: Kacper

customer_reviews.title: high quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: high quality gamming headset and very comfortable,they give you a good feeling but i wanted to have a little more volume.
customer_reviews.author: danilaflorin

customer_reviews.title: Do your ears a favour
customer_reviews.text: Comfy to wear the sound quality is something else and the quality is brilliant....maybe worth getting a usb extension cable if your computer is far away from you
customer_reviews.author: thomas williams

customer_reviews.title: Avoid logitech headset
customer_reviews.text: Avoid two pairs I've had and after about 2week the mic starts cracking when talking on both pairs I've since had a full refund and gone to the ps4 platinum and are actually really good
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Good headset but bad lifespan
customer_reviews.text: I've had this headset for all of 3 months and it was great. I hadn't had any issues with it, but over night one of the speakers in the headset stopped working. I'm pretty sure its the wires in the headset but it's just very dissapointing how little time I had with it before I developed problems. It was taken care of very well. Sad to see it go.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Best headset
customer_reviews.text: I have used plenty of headsets but this one is definitely the best I have used. The sound quality is outstanding and also the microphone on the headset is amazing and using the Logitech G HUB and using the integrated Blue Voice settings are outstanding and are definitely one of the best to use. 10/10 worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie German

customer_reviews.title: Gammig headphones
customer_reviews.text: Good for gaming (FPS) but not really good for listening music. Clear voice from microphone.
customer_reviews.author: WirtualBB

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gaming headphones.
customer_reviews.text: The clarity and general mixing capabilities are amazing with these. i’ve just switched from a £100 pair of corsair wireless headphones and they were a huge let down. if you’re looking for a comfortable and great sounding pair of headphones then these are a no brainier
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Logitech headset
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my son's gaming and the sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Kizza

customer_reviews.title: Amaxing Headset
customer_reviews.text: The quality is superb with good surround sound. Nice software as well.
customer_reviews.author: ManSil

customer_reviews.title: mic not working, good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: audio quality is amazing but mic doesnt work (is undetectable in windows). after some quick searching it turns out many people have also had this problem and there’s not really a solution. so sucksif you want to discord.
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Good sound.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable to wear, great sound, nice RGB lighting. Great!
customer_reviews.author: E. Batchelor

customer_reviews.title: Volume control cover just fell off
customer_reviews.text: These just arrived on 2 days ago I haven't used for more than 4 hours altogether. The cover on the volume control just fell off. Not happy at all
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kernan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, Meh software
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, but the blue mic it comes with, don’t use it. The microphone quality is much worse. Also, when I first got the headset, the software wouldn’t detect it. But this has never happened since.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Good Headphones Bad Mic
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable pair of headphones I’ve worn and the sound quality is amazing. However the microphone isn’t very good it’s either too loud and bass boosted or too quiet and muffled. I would definitely get these as headphones but speak on something else.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Charalambou Elledge

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Left ear cup stopped working after 3 months. And it's nothing to do with the cable, I've checked. Overall sound quality was decent. Microphone is one of the better ones I've tested. Design looks nice, but the cup size seems to be on the smaller side.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good headset, Comfy and good build quality.
customer_reviews.text: The sound on these headphones is ok for the price paid, more than good enough for gaming and watching youtube. They are also really comfy with excellent noise cancellation.
customer_reviews.author: aaron ward

customer_reviews.title: Great headset at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Best microphone quality you can get without buying an external mic. Logitech software offers a lot of customisation for both sound and microphone. If you’re buying for pc this is the headset for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Avoid at all costs
customer_reviews.text: Noise cancellation and sound in games was top quality, however the microphone worked for a total of 30 minutes. Tried every single “fix” online to no avail if you don’t want to waste 3 hours of your life trying to fix a new headset avoid!
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Buy these!!! Bought these for gaming but I had no idea music could sound this good. Excellent quality. Currently listening to my playlist on youtube like it's the first time i have heard these songs. Easy set up on my PC. Just plug and play.
customer_reviews.author: Simon McElvanney

customer_reviews.title: Great but slightly broken
customer_reviews.text: On arrival one of the notches on a wire was apart. I had to use super glue to hold it in place. Was a disappointment on what is a overall great product
customer_reviews.author: Declan L.

customer_reviews.title: All around gaming / streaming headset.
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding headphones with a wide sound stage. Mic is good quality and the blue! Mic software adds lots of customisation. Allows for adjustments to correct acoustics all digital.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: PC GAMERS YHIS IS THE HEADSET YOU BUY TRUST ME PUBG ETC OH MY GAAAAWD
customer_reviews.text: The best goddam headset on the planet and it's more than half the price of crappy headsets love you Logitech quality company quality products quality service
customer_reviews.author: Edward tech reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Good mic, and sound quality is good for the price but the best feature is the downloadable EQ profiles, also comfortable to wear during long sessions. Only improvement would be to split the voice audio from the main and would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Florian Marqua

customer_reviews.title: Use it daily and very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome headset, nice and comfy with super sound production. Not tried the mic but I assume it works.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Raven

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: The headset worked great! I got to use it for a limited amount of time as my pc has now got audio driver issues (which I don't believe was the headset) quality great and looks simple and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Grabouski

customer_reviews.title: Logitech Leading The Way Forward
customer_reviews.text: Just wow this is a quality product the feel and build with it being light and comfortable all work perfectly. The DTS super stereo mode is mind blowing and the mic is incredibly clear with so many presets available you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for FPS foot steps
customer_reviews.text: Can hear foot steps way more clear in war zone giving me the advantage ! Highly recommend 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Dave H

customer_reviews.title: The Mic and Noise Cancellation is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I can't even hear my family speak from the amazing noise cancellation and the microphone is impeccable and all my friends love to hear my voice. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Vickers

customer_reviews.title: V good but annoying software
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality just having a bit of trouble with the software hence the 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Charlie patch

customer_reviews.title: Good, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Finding it lovely to use for gaming and voice calls. Not really a 'noise cancelling' set of headphones but it's overall pretty good quality and the price was fair.
customer_reviews.author: George Seed

customer_reviews.title: For a 100 pounds headphones the wire tangles WAY to easily
customer_reviews.text: For a 100 pounds headphones the wire tangles WAY to easily also you cannot increase the volume as much as i imagined for such expensive headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Lewis Gilmour

customer_reviews.title: The biggest problem with this headset was a faulty left driver.
customer_reviews.text: The left driver seemed quiet compared to the right one and then i have used it for a day and the clamping force was too much. The sound quality was not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolas

customer_reviews.title: Broken already
customer_reviews.text: Broke in about 3 months and are utterly useless now. For £110 it shouldn't cease functioning for no discernible reason whatsoever. Purchased ones for a third of that price that lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Alliott Kurn

customer_reviews.title: Mic stopped working
customer_reviews.text: The mic on it disconnect so easily and 1 week with having it and the mic has already stopped working... Do not buy this it's a complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Tippett

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound
customer_reviews.text: Really worth investing in a good headset game changer if you play fps games the G X Pro is really comfortable and good sound quality A*
customer_reviews.author: Callum

customer_reviews.title: not for everyone but good for some
customer_reviews.text: it felt very preimum an looked great but i wanted 7.1 wireless. and compared to the audio quality of the ones i bought years ago they didnt compete. and i also hate the wires.
customer_reviews.author: david john willers

customer_reviews.title: Good quality headphones.
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my son. He’s very happy and likes the amount of scope there is to change settings on the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Tracypastry

customer_reviews.title: Good but Faulty
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing but mine broke within the firs three months of using them. I did nothing to damage them yet the left earphe just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: My order was missing two parts The Y cable and the USB adapter, so I can’t use the microphone the way I want
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Microphone and Sound issue
customer_reviews.text: Alot of static noice from microphone and headphones. Used 2 other headphones and they were fine. Overall, amazing build quality but not great on microphone and sound
customer_reviews.author: Adam Chua

customer_reviews.title: Great headset with surround sound!
customer_reviews.text: Just got my replacement for the one with the mic issue and it works great! Do recommend! You can use G Hub to edit your settings for it, so much fun
customer_reviews.author: Nika

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for gaming, gives you great control for gaming, surround sound is also cool!
customer_reviews.author: Nicola

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All round decent headset
customer_reviews.text: Every now and then you'll put them on and catch you fingers in between the metal and the headphones and it'll leave you with a black fingernail. Other than that they're good for their price, great surround sound, good comfort(mild clamp). Music is ok on them but they're for games. The G-Hub app with sound and mic presets with the USB DAC driver is what makes these so good. Mic quality with a good sound EQ with presets you can download make these probably the best headphones for playing games while on discord.
customer_reviews.author: sion

product_meta.title: Logitech G PRO X Gaming Headset (2nd Generation) with Blue VO!CE, DTS Headphone:X 7.1 and 50 mm PRO-G Drivers (for PC, PS4, Switch, Xbox One, VR) - Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:Surround Sound| Pattern Name:WiredHear and sound like a pro with the PRO X Gaming Headset. Blue VO!CE microphone technology* lets you communicate with greater clarity and confidence. Detachable pro-grade microphone filters tune your voice in real time to sound richer, cleaner and more professional. Featuring next-gen 7. 1 surround sound* and PRO-G 50-mm drivers for amazingly clear sound imaging. Soft memory foam-padded leatherette or velour earcups. Durable steel + aluminium construction. Premium USB external sound card gives you crystal-clear game sound and voice chat. Designed for tournaments with downloadable audio EQ profiles tuned by your favourite esports pros. Play to win. *Requires included USB external sound card, Windows PC and Logitech G HUB software.
feature_bullets: Detachable pro-grade microphone filters tune your voice in real time to sound richer, cleaner and more professional, reduces background noise and eliminates pops and hisses for clear, consistent, in-game comms and streaming
Provides greater positional and distance awareness, so you know exactly where your opponents are before they find you and experience greater immersion in all your games
Comfortable memory foam padding – Soft memory foam earpads with your choice of premium passive noise-cancelling leatherette or soft, breathable velour for supreme comfort
Durable steel and aluminium construction – Aluminium and steel frame and construction is comfortable, durable and strong
PRO-G 50-mm drivers – Advanced drivers with unique hybrid mesh construction deliver clear and precise sound imaging and improved bass response
